overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Your privacy and the protection of your personal data is important to us. The following sections provide details about how we process your personal information. We don't share your information with third parties except to deliver our Services and products, comply with the law, improve our services, protect our rights, or effectuate a business transfer. We're just developers trying to deliver an incredible product.

acceptance.title: How do you accept this policy
acceptance.content: By using our application, including downloading our mobile applications or visiting our website, you agree to the use, disclosure, and procedures outlined in this Privacy Policy.

collection.title: What personal information do we collect
collection.content: We minimize the amount of Personal Information we collect. Your contact information, such as phone number or email address (depending on how you contact us), may be collected when you communicate with us for support, report issues, or interact through social media. When using our Services, we process PUBLIC wallet addresses you generate.

sharing.title: Information sharing with third parties
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with service providers who help operate our business. These providers only access information needed for their functions and must follow our data protection requirements. In case of business transfers or legal requirements, some information might be transferred while maintaining privacy commitments.

usage.title: How we use your information
usage.content: We use collected information to enhance our services. This includes: responding to support requests, fixing technical issues, providing updates about our services, and improving user experience. We may use aggregated, non-personal data for analysis and service improvement.

rights.title: Your privacy rights
rights.content: You have the right to: access your personal data, request corrections, object to processing, request data deletion, and restrict processing. Some data might be retained for legal compliance. Blockchain transactions cannot be deleted due to technical limitations.

retention.title: Data retention
retention.content: Even if you delete your wallet or uninstall our application, we may retain some information for maintenance or legal compliance. Contact us with any questions about data retention.

security.title: Data security
security.content: We protect your information using industry-standard security measures. While we implement strong safeguards, no system is completely secure. We use encryption and follow best practices for data protection.

children.title: Children's privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children. Users must be at least 18 years old. We don't knowingly collect information from children under 13. Contact us if you believe a child has provided us information.

updates.title: Policy updates
updates.content: We may update this policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We'll notify you of significant changes. Continued use of our services after updates means you accept the changes.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: We're here to help with your privacy questions or concerns.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility

account.content: You may need to create an account to use our application. You are responsible for keeping your account information accurate and up to date. It is your responsibility to ensure the security of your account and prevent unauthorized access. You should contact us immediately if you notice any suspicious activity.

wallet.content: Your Wallet allows you to securely store and manage your crypto assets. You are responsible for the security of your private keys and recovery phrases. Loss of this information may result in loss of access to your assets, and we cannot be held responsible for such loss.

transactions.title: 5. Transactions and Fees
transactions.content: Your cryptocurrency transactions are executed on the blockchain network and are irreversible. Transaction fees may vary depending on network conditions. Your Wallet cannot be held responsible for transfers to incorrect addresses or erroneous transactions.

prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content: It is strictly forbidden to use the application for illegal activities, money laundering, terrorism financing, or fraud. If such activities are detected, your account will be suspended and necessary legal actions will be initiated.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Your Wallet cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect losses, loss of profit, loss of data, or fluctuations in cryptocurrency values. We provide our services 'as is' and make no warranties.

faq.question: What is Your Wallet and why should it be preferred?
faq.answer: Your Wallet is a secure digital wallet that enables you to transact on the Solana blockchain. Thanks to Solana's high speed and low transaction fees, you can transfer your crypto assets quickly and economically. It stands out with its user-friendly interface and advanced security features. It's an ideal solution for both beginners and experienced users.

faq.question: What transactions can I make on the Solana network?
faq.answer: Through Your Wallet, you can perform basic crypto transactions on the Solana network: you can transfer SOL, perform SPL token transactions, and securely store your assets. You can easily view and manage all assets in your wallet.

faq.question: What are the security features?
faq.answer: Your Wallet offers security features optimized for the Solana network. Your private keys are encrypted locally and Solana's secure signing protocols are used. Two-factor authentication (2FA), biometric verification, and automatic logout features are available. Program audits and security tests are conducted regularly. We have Solana network-specific security alerts and suspicious transaction detection system.

faq.question: How are transaction fees determined?
faq.answer: Transaction fees on the Solana network are very low. A standard transfer transaction costs approximately 0.000005 SOL (less than a penny). As Your Wallet, we fully reflect this advantage of Solana to our users. Minimum service fees are charged for transactions made through the platform, and all costs are transparently shown before the transaction.

faq.question: How can I get started?
faq.answer: To start using Your Wallet, first download the app and create an account. Securely back up your seed phrase to create your Solana wallet. You can use our supported payment methods to buy SOL or transfer from another wallet. Our getting started guide and 24/7 support team will help you.

faq.question: What should I do in case of asset loss?
faq.answer: If you lose access to your Solana wallet, you can recover all your assets with your seed phrase. If you notice a suspicious transaction, you can instantly freeze your account and contact our support team. Token lists and program IDs are continuously updated to provide protection against possible fraud.

faq.question: What are the portfolio viewing features?
faq.answer: Your Wallet's portfolio viewing tools allow you to monitor your Solana assets from one place. You can view the real-time value and transaction history of all assets in your wallet. You can track important transaction confirmations with customizable notifications.

faq.question: What currencies are supported?
faq.answer: Your Wallet currently supports Solana (SOL) and SPL tokens on Solana. More token support will be added in the near future. The list of supported tokens is regularly updated.
